title: Fly High Tulisan Jawi Contest (2) : Dot @ Win
content:
Salam Kawanku  
Some dots inside [http://typophile.com/files/MissingDots.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317224710/http:/typophile.com/files/MissingDots.pdf "http://typophile.com/files/MissingDots.pdf") are missing. Put them back @ win a copy of Arabic/Jawi Kaligrafer.  
ببراڤا تيتيق د دالم لامن اين هيلڠ. ملتقکن مريک کمبالي @ ممنڠي سالينن عرب / جاوي کاليݢرافير  
 [http://www.maryamsoft.com/QalamBartar](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317224710/http:/www.maryamsoft.com/QalamBartar "http://www.maryamsoft.com/QalamBartar")  
 [http://bagaimanalagi.com/?cat=14](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317224710/http:/bagaimanalagi.com/?cat=14 "http://bagaimanalagi.com/?cat=14")  
Deadline: 2014.09.09  
All the Best for All

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317224710im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Jawi%20Missing%20Dots1_6489.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [MissingDots.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317224710/http:/typophile.com/files/MissingDots.pdf) | 73.43 KB |
author: AzizMostafa
